study_plan_entry.title: Neurosciences I : molecular neuroscience and neurodegeneration

free_text.Learning outcomes: The goal of this course is to guide students through the essential aspects of molecular neuroscience and neurodegenerative diseases.[br/]The student will integrate a molecular and cellular understanding of how the nervous system develops, how brain cells function and communicate with each other, how brain cells survive, regenerate and repair, and ultimately how such processes can become dysfunctional and lead to disease.[br/][br/]To illustrate the complexity of the nervous system, this course will give special emphasis to the known molecular mechanisms of[br/]neurodegenerative disease and pioneering drug development and[br/]therapies.[br/][br/]The student will gain the ability to dissect the molecular basis of disease in the nervous system in order to identify therapeutic strategies.[br/]
free_text.Content: [li] Unique biology of neurons[br/][li] Molecular neuropharmacology[br/][li] Unique biology of glial cells[br/][li] Generation, survival and integration of nerve cells[br/][li] Synapse formation, regeneration and plasticity[br/][li] Anatomical and functional organization of the brain[br/][li] Alzheimer's disease[br/][li] Parkinson's disease[br/][li] Motor neuron diseases[br/][li] Prion diseases[br/][li] Polyglutamine expansion diseases[br/][li] Protein aggregation in neurodegenerative disease[br/][li] Animal models of disease and translational neuroscience.

free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: L'objectif de ce cours est de guider les élèves dans les aspects[br/]essentiels de la neuroscience moléculaire et des maladies[br/]neurodégénératives.[br/][br/]L'étudiant devra intégrer une compréhension moléculaire et cellulaire[br/]de la façon dont le système nerveux se développe, comment les[br/]neurones communiquent les uns avec les autres, comment ils[br/]survivent, se régénérent et se réparent et, finalement, comment un tel[br/]processus peut devenir dysfonctionnel et conduire à la maladie.[br/]Pour illustrer la complexité du système nerveux, ce cours donnera[br/]une importance particulière aux mécanismes moléculaires connus de[br/]maladies neurodégénératives et au développement de médicaments[br/]et de thérapies novatrices.[br/][br/]L'étudiant devra acquérir la capacité de disséquer la base[br/]moléculaire de la maladie afin d'identifier les strategies thérapeutiques.
